feat: add advanced charting with technical indicators and drawing tools

## New Features

### Technical Indicators
- Added SMA 20/50 (Simple Moving Average)
- Added EMA 20/50 (Exponential Moving Average)
- Indicators toggle via toolbar
- Client-side calculation for performance
- Color-coded indicator lines

### Drawing Tools Framework
- Trend line tool for support/resistance
- Horizontal line for key price levels
- Rectangle tool for zones
- Fibonacci retracement levels
- Risk/Reward ratio visualizer
- Clear all drawings button

### Chart Enhancements
- New ChartToolbar component with tool selection
- AdvancedChart component replacing CandlestickChart
- Indicator calculation utilities
- Better chart organization and structure

### Documentation
- ANGEL_ONE_TOKENS.md - Comprehensive token reference for stocks/indices
- FEATURES.md - Complete feature documentation
- Updated App.tsx to use AdvancedChart

## Technical Details
- Implemented indicator calculation algorithms (SMA, EMA, Fibonacci)
- Created reusable ChartToolbar component
- Added drawing tool state management
- Optimized for smooth performance
